00035 class CComponentBase: virtual public IComponent
00036 {
00037 public:
00041        CComponentBase();
00042 
00043        // reimplemented (icomp::IComponent)
00044        virtual const IComponent* GetParentComponent(bool ownerOnly = false) const;
00045        virtual void* GetInterface(const istd::CClassInfo& interfaceType, const std::string& subId = "");
00046        virtual const IComponentContext* GetComponentContext() const;
00047        virtual void SetComponentContext(
00048                             const icomp::IComponentContext* contextPtr,
00049                             const IComponent* parentPtr,
00050                             bool isParentOwner);
00051        virtual IComponent* GetSubcomponent(const std::string& componentId) const;
00052        virtual const IComponentContext* GetSubcomponentContext(const std::string& componentId) const;
00053        virtual IComponent* CreateSubcomponent(const std::string& componentId) const;
00054        virtual void OnSubcomponentDeleted(const IComponent* subcomponentPtr);
00055 
00056 protected:
00061        bool IsComponentActive() const;
00062 
00063        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00064        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00065 
00066        // abstract methods
00070        virtual const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& GetComponentStaticInfo() const = 0;
00071 
00072        // static methods
00073        static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(IComponent* componentPtr);
00074 
00075 private:
00076        const IComponentContext* m_contextPtr;
00077        const IComponent* m_parentPtr;
00078        bool m_isParentOwner;
00079 };

00082 // inline protected methods
00083 
00084 inline bool CComponentBase::IsComponentActive() const
00085 {
00086        return (m_contextPtr != NULL);
00087 }

00101 #define I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(ComponentType)\
00102        static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(ComponentType* componentPtr)\
00103        {\
00104               static icomp::TComponentStaticInfo<ComponentType> staticInfo(&BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(NULL));\
00105               static bool isStaticInitialized = false;\
00106               if (isStaticInitialized && (componentPtr == NULL)){\
00107                      return staticInfo;\
00108               }\
00109               isStaticInitialized = true;\
00110               BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(componentPtr);
00111 
00118 #define I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(ComponentType)\
00119        static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(ComponentType* componentPtr)\
00120        {\
00121               static icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo staticInfo(&BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(NULL));\
00122               static bool isStaticInitialized = false;\
00123               if (isStaticInitialized && (componentPtr == NULL)){\
00124                      return staticInfo;\
00125               }\
00126               isStaticInitialized = true;\
00127               BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(componentPtr);
00128 
00136 #define I_END_COMPONENT\
00137               return staticInfo;\
00138        }\
00139        virtual const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& GetComponentStaticInfo() const\
00140        {\
00141               return InitStaticInfo(NULL);\
00142        }

00394 template <class Dest>
00395 Dest* CompCastPtr(istd::IPolymorphic* objectPtr)
00396 {
00397        const icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::IComponent*>(objectPtr);
00398        if (componentPtr != NULL){
00399               icomp::IComponent* parentComponentPtr = const_cast<icomp::IComponent*>(componentPtr->GetParentComponent(true));
00400 
00401               if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
00402                      Dest* retVal = (Dest*)parentComponentPtr->GetInterface(istd::CClassInfo(typeid(Dest)));
00403 
00404                      if (retVal != NULL){
00405                             return retVal;
00406                      }
00407               }
00408        }
00409 
00410        return dynamic_cast<Dest*>(objectPtr);
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00419 template <class Dest>
00420 const Dest* CompCastPtr(const istd::IPolymorphic* objectPtr)
00421 {
00422        const icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::IComponent*>(objectPtr);
00423        if (componentPtr != NULL){
00424               icomp::IComponent* parentComponentPtr = const_cast<icomp::IComponent*>(componentPtr->GetParentComponent(true));
00425 
00426               if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
00427                      const Dest* retVal = (const Dest*)parentComponentPtr->GetInterface(istd::CClassInfo(typeid(Dest)));
00428 
00429                      if (retVal != NULL){
00430                             return retVal;
00431                      }
00432               }
00433        }
00434 
00435        return dynamic_cast<const Dest*>(objectPtr);
00436 }
